text: I've got my Chinese shortbread cookies
they look like an alien
hey guys its angel sorry it's been a
while since my last video but there was
these holidays and then Chinese New Year
and then I kind of got sick in between
for a couple weeks I had lost my voice
and had a major major runny nose and so
I didn't want to be spreading my virtual
journeys everywhere but now I'm back and
during the time I was resting I was
actually playing this addictive game on
my phone called best fiends now this
video sponsored by best fiends where I'm
going to be making a matcha shortbread
leaf cookie inspired by the best fiends
game if you haven't heard of best fiends
before it's this really cool tie black
that's super addicting so you basically
take your finger and you swipe to
connect and make chains of the items
that are the same color and it's really
really addicting if you play candy crush
before kind of like that you don't have
it already use the link below and you'll
get five dollars worth of golden
diamonds
and who doesn't like virtual currency
and in addition if you guys have
facebook you could also link the game to
facebook where you can compete with your
friends I am on level 32 right now and
I'm sure lots of you are maybe like on a
level a hundred plus so post in the
comments below let me know what level
you are on and I will try to beat you in
addition this month in honor of
Valentine's Day they have a Valentine's
heart challenge where you can win prizes
and rewards and there will be a free
gift on Valentine's Day so make sure you
play that day so with that let's get
started and I will show you how to make
these five ingredient matcha shortbread
cookies first start by measuring out two
cups of all-purpose flour then add a
quarter teaspoon of salt and two and a
half tablespoons of matcha powder sift
those ingredients with a whisk then set
the bowl aside next in a stand mixer
creamed together 18 tablespoons of
unsalted softened butter and
three-quarters of a cup of granulated
sugar next little by little slowly add
the flour mixture to make the shortbread
dough roll the dough into a ball and
place it in a bag to chill in the fridge
for 30 minutes
once the dough is chilled lightly flour
countertop and roll the dough out with a
rolling pin until a quarter inch thick
then using your leaf cookie cutter make
cutouts into the shortbread dough now I
just used an egg shaped cookie cutter
and molded it with my hands into a leaf
shape finally using a butter knife I
just made an indentation on top of the
shortbread dough in the shape of a leaf
stem when you're done bake your cookies
in a preheated oven at 350 degrees for
10 to 15 minutes or until the edges are
golden brown so that's how you make
these much of shortbread leaf cookies
inspired by the best fiends game now if
you guys are wondering I recommend
pairing these leaf cookies with a cup of
matcha latte or even some green tea they
really go well with those drinks and if
you guys want to print this recipe I
will leave links in the video
description below to my website where
you can from my recipes and including
this one thank you guys so much for
watching I hope you enjoyed this video
and tell them take care and I will see
you guys soon
bye for now
